Name: Amagi (天城)
Fate: Capsized after air attacks, 29 July 1945, scrapped 1946–47
Range: 8,000 nmi (15,000 km; 9,200 mi) at 18 knots (33 km/h; 21 mph)
processing systems:
2 × Type 2, Mark 2, Model 1 air search radars
2 × Type 3, Mark 1, Model 3 air search radars
1 × Type 93 sonar
2 × Type 0 hydrophones
Armament:
6 × twin 12.7 cm/40 Type 89 anti-aircraft guns
13 × triple, 3 × single Type 96 25 mm (0.98 in) AA guns
6 × 28 – 12 cm (4.7 in) AA rocket launchers
